planCardDescription: Below are the details of your current plan. You can change your plan or cancel your subscription at any time.
billingPortalCardDescription: Visit your Billing Portal to manage your subscription and billing. You can update or cancel your plan, or download your invoices.
cancelAtPeriodEndDescription: Your subscription is scheduled to be canceled on {{- endDate }}.
renewAtPeriodEndDescription: Your subscription is scheduled to be renewed on {{- endDate }}
noPermissionsAlertHeading: You don't have permissions to change the billing settings
noPermissionsAlertBody: Please contact your organization owner to change the billing settings for your organization.
checkoutSuccessDescription: Thank you for subscribing, we have successfully processed your subscription! A confirmation email will be sent to {{ customerEmail }}.

free.heading: You are currently on the Free Plan
free.description: You're on a free plan. You can upgrade to a paid plan at any time.

active.heading: Your subscription is active
active.description: Your subscription is active. You can manage your subscription and billing in the Customer Portal.

trialing.heading: You're on a trial
trialing.description: Your trial will end on {{- trialEndDate }}.

past_due.heading: Your invoice is past due
past_due.description: Your invoice is past due. Please update your payment method.

canceled.heading: Your subscription is canceled
canceled.description: Your subscription is canceled. It is scheduled to end on {{- endDate }}.

unpaid.heading: Your invoice is unpaid
unpaid.description: Your invoice is unpaid. Please update your payment method.

incomplete.heading: We're waiting for your payment
incomplete.description: We're waiting for your payment to go through. Please bear with us.

incomplete_expired.heading: Your payment has expired
incomplete_expired.description: Your payment has expired. Please update your payment method.

paused.heading: Your subscription is paused
paused.description: Your subscription is paused. You can resume it at any time.
